docs.title: About datatype
docs.text:
AGLDWG Datatype Ontology (Linkml Schema)

Modeled from https://raw.githack.com/AGLDWG/datatype-ont/master/html/datatype.html

docs.title: AGLDWG Datatype Ontology (LinkML rendering)
docs.text:
LinkML schema of AGLDWG Datatypes (http://linked.data.gov.au/def/datatype).

A set of classes representing data-types. These may be used for observation results, or for the range of specific properties in other applications where scaled numbers, ranges, percents, etc, are required.

History Note: Originally developed for use as the value of an observation result (sosa:hasResult) in the context of the TERN-plot ontology. However, objects from these classes may appear in many contexts.

URI: https://w3id.org/lmodel/datatype

Name: datatype

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Boolean Class to encapsulate a true-or-false value Concept Class to encapsulate a classifier, usually a values from a controlled vocabul... Count Class to encapsulate an integer value QuantitativeMeasure Class to encapsulate a quantitative measure value Percent Class to encapsulate a quantitative measure expressed as a percent value QuantitativeRange Class to encapsulate a quantitative range PercentRange Class to encapsulate a quantitative range expressed as in percent values Text Class to encapsulate a textual value

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description max Maximum value of a range min Minimum value of range standard Measurement standard, scale, uom, reference system, controlled vocabulary, ta... uncertainty Uncertainty for a quantitative value unit Measurement scale value simple value (a literal) vocabulary controlled vocabulary, taxonomy etc

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value ConceptValue Idea or notion; a unit of thought Curie a compact URI DataValue simple value (a literal) Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... DecimalValue Generic decimal value used for quantitative measures Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer IntegerValue Integer count value Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model PercentValue Percentage value Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string StringValue Generic string value Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... UnitValue Unit of measure value Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

  • base: str

  • uri: xsd:string

docs.title: Type: Jsonpointer
docs.text:

docs.title: Type: Sparqlpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path. The value of the string MUST conform to SPARQL syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded as RDF.

docs.title: datatype
docs.text:
LinkML schema of AGLDWG Datatypes (http://linked.data.gov.au/def/datatype).

A set of classes representing data-types. These may be used for observation results, or for the range of specific properties in other applications where scaled numbers, ranges, percents, etc, are required.

History Note: Originally developed for use as the value of an observation result (sosa:hasResult) in the context of the TERN-plot ontology. However, objects from these classes may appear in many contexts.

URI: https://w3id.org/lmodel/datatype
